description:
After Choji takes the yellow pill it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State, giving him immense power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu l`ami, je ne t`oublierai jamais
Good-Bye Old Friend! I`ll Always Believe in You!
Saraba Tomo yo...! Soredemo Ore wa Shinjiteru
ลาก่อนเพื่อนรักแต่ฉันก็ยังเชื่อมั่น
さらば友よ...! それでもオレは信じてる
